title: Alternative Medicine at Canyon Ranch Lenox
description: Explore alternative medicine and wellness at Canyon Ranch Lenox, where experts integrate precise answers into a state of well-being that's singularly yours.
cleaned_text: Unsure where to start? How It Works Select a focused Pathway with curated services bundled to support your intention. Explore a topic such as healthy weight, life transitions, wellness, or joy. Work with a knowledgeable Wellness Guide to create a tailored itinerary. Acuphoria A calming acupuncture treatment that centers the heart and mind and establishes a natural state of euphoria. This is a delightful introduction to an ancient healing art. Acupuncture A session with a licensed acupuncturist balances your body's energy (chi), and stimulates natural healing processes. Treat health issues like arthritis, asthma, or depression. Acupuncture for Healthy Weight This session of specialized acupuncture is used extensively in China to decrease food cravings, while increasing energy and digestive efficiency to meet healthy weight goals. Acupuncture Massage Designed to help treat musculoskeletal pain and stress-related problems, this unique experience combines a therapeutic massage with acupressure and acupuncture treatments. Acutonics Sound healing uses vibration, intention, and light touch to align body and mind. Tuning forks applied to acupuncture points, chakras, and trigger points balance meridians. Chinese Herbal Consult A Chinese medicine practitioner can assess herbal solutions to treat arthritis, fatigue, high cholesterol, insomnia, menopause or PMS symptoms, migraines, asthma and more. Chinese Vitality Explore any patterns of disharmony that may keep you from optimal health with a comprehensive lifestyle evaluation, acupuncture treatment, and Chinese herbal recommendation. Detox Acupuncture Treatment A blend of two ancient healing methods come together: a personalized acupuncture treatment with a warm abdominal castor oil pack to heal, relax, soothe and detoxify the body. Experience the mind-body benefits of complementary and alternative therapies at our Berkshires resort. Whether you seek to balance your energy, relieve nervous tension, or address a specific health concern, licensed bodywork practitioners at Canyon Ranch Lenox adapt each session to serve your unique wellness goals.
